cast.name: 耶维斯·布莱特 Yves Bright
维罗妮卡·阿利奇诺 Veronica Alicino

introduction: Stacey and James are marketing executives who are visiting New York for an annual marketing conference for their respective companies. Both are workaholics who are extremely absorbed with their careers. They meet late one night in the hotel bar as James encourages Stacey to have a "little" fun and let loose. The night turns into a night of drinking, dancing and a one night stand. The morning reveals that they have several things in common. A perfect match made in heaven? Together forever? So it would seem, until they discover something that is quite shocking and disturbing about each other.
